recipe.title: The Produce Stand
ingredients: 2 to 4 fresh basil leaves, plus more for garnish
2 ounces Sagatiba Pura or another cachaça
instructions: Muddle the cherry tomatoes and lime in a shaker. Add the basil, tomato juice, and cachaça. Then season to taste with Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and salt. Add ice. Shake well and serve in a tall glass garnished with basil or cherry tomatoes speared on toothpicks.
